topic.para: Description: The permission mask of directories created by syslog-ng. Log directories are only created if a file after macro expansion refers to a non-existing directory, and directory creation is enabled (see also the create_dirs() option). For octal numbers prefix the number with 0, for example use 0755 for rwxr-xr-x.

To preserve the original properties of an existing directory, use the option without specifying an attribute: dir_perm(). Note that when creating a new directory without specifying attributes for dir_perm(), the default permission of the directories is masked with the umask of the parent process (typically 0022).
